storyInfo: Following Maria's victory, the Spokesman and the Armorless Union begin to make moves. All intrigue points to the next big match.

attributes.content: Mr. Czarny, there're too many calls coming from the various departments, we can't handle them all!
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Just think of something. Try to make those still sane understand that 'victory' and 'value' are not equal.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: O-okay!
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: ...Sir 'Left-hand', do you really not require further medical examination?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: No. Being able to knock me unconscious right when I was casting my Arts is already the limit of her ability. She's still far from being able to seriously injure me.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Pardon my bluntness, but the results of this match were a shock to many.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Even without an insignificant victory in this match, I will still bring the entirety of the Blade Helmet Knightclub into the Major with me. Worry not, spokesman.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: You're very confident, good.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: If you had gone all out, Maria Nearl would have stood no chance of victory. I hope that you will be able to deal with the fallout of this unexpected loss...
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: I will not make excuses for myself.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: You may end up losing opportunities from some major sponsors. Perhaps your Knightclub can——
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: ——If those people are only able to see the most superficial wins and losses and cannot understand how to manage their interests, then they are not fit to work with me.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: You're right.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Hype is the basis of profit. The customers have only ever cared about what they can see. In other words, they are only trying to get some sensory stimulation... without being aware of it themselves.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: However, I never expected that Sir Tytus Topola himself would place such a clear price on his own 'failure'...
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Spokesman, do not attempt to provoke me.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Yes, yes, my apologies......We will leave as soon as we are done handling all those troublesome matters.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Let us meet again at the Major, Sir 'Left-hand'.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: So that's it... Sona and them were doing such things...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: The Infected fighters' arena. I'd heard of this competition format... No, this cannot even be considered a 'format'.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Whether or not they come from a knight family, anyone can become a competition knight, earn the recognition of the Knights Association through their grit and become a noble...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: But the Infected...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: They'll let the Infected join the competitions, but there's no country that would let an Infected become a pillar of society. That's why they're segregated in another competition format.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: The Infected can earn money and live on, but they'll forever be simple gladiators trying to entertain the masses... Tch. There ain't any meaning to such a sideshow.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Oh, I don't mean anything by that.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: You old geezer, can't you be more tactful with your words?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Who in hell am I supposed to be tactful for, huh? They're almost onto us!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: The Infected matter is worrying, but... now is not the time to be worrying about them.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...Yeah.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: They changed their fate as Infected through their own tenacity... But they've saved many people.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: If we want to change anything, we will have to continue moving forward.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Little Maria has become a respectable knight capable of such words... If only Margaret could see this, surely she would be gratified...
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Don't speak of the Radiant Knight like she's dead, you idiot!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: You're the one twisting my words, Kowal!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Maria? What's wrong?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: N-Nothing!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: The Champion's Wall... What a lousy place for conversation.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: ...Pictures of all the old champions, huh. This Black Knight alone has three spots.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Even though she dominated the Major for so many years, she doesn't seem to have aged a day... Eh, why do I feel like she looks younger than me...?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Miss must be kidding.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Is that just good genes? How nice. How enviable.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The Black Knight surely left an impressive mark on the history of knight sports. No one could have ever guessed that a Leithanian completely incapable of using Arts would ever become the 'Black Knight' we know today.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Her era is long gone, however... She herself has left Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: I wouldn't expect you to let go of a cash cow like that.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: ...A dominating champion would indeed invite many worshippers, but it is very much a detriment to the development of the industry as a whole, in the long run...
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: In short, it's exciting to see new challengers attempting to defeat the Black Knight, but after she managed to hold her own for three entire seasons... It started to get boring.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: The Black Knight's prospects near the end of her career weren't very good. The number of people who wanted to get rid of her one way or another could fill an entire arena.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Her luck was pretty good, though. Just as she was being cornered, she met a VIP from Kjerag.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: She got a reasonable price... that satisfied everyone.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Being able to support a good turnover is also a sign of a well-developed industry.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: ...And then there's this, an empty space.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Yes. I don't think I need to elaborate.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: I know this one. From last season, the Blood Knight.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The Blood Knight's terror and might are unprecedented in the arena. Thankfully, he's rather astute and hasn't caused much trouble for us.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: You should tell him to take it easy on the drugs from time to time. Knights are the most important assets, right?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I will take that to heart, Miss.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: ...Well? I don't suppose the spokesman of the General Chamber of Commerce invited me here for a history lesson?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Sorry to trouble you. The Champion's Wall will be open to the public during the Major, so I have to do a check beforehand.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Of course, this is also one of the few places where I can speak without interruption.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Hm... Alright. It's about another job, isn't it? I can't get away anyway, so I might as well listen.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: It's not just about a job... I wonder if you know what the two Lazurites are doing today?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: You're not cleared to know. And neither am I.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I've heard some interesting rumors on the grapevine...
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: What sort of major incident could've happened, that would need both Lazurites moving out in force?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: ——Ahh la la, I didn't hear anything. Nothing at all.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Miss.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: I've checked all the requests from the other directors. There isn't a single 'major incident' that would require a Lazurite, let alone both of them.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: You don't have worry about that. Just know it's an order from the General Chamber of Commerce.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Is that so...? I can rest assured then.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: ...You really don't trust me, huh.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Why do you say so, Miss?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: You know very well that asking me stuff about my bosses is a waste of time. Are you trying to give a warning to this 'immature Platinum'? Alright, alright, message received.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: You're very smart. However, my suspicions are also very valid. Even if the upper echelons are hiding things from me, I must perform my duties to perfection.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Yes. If you can, please instruct a subordinate of yours to help keep track of someone.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Who?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Czarny glances at the empty spot on the wall next to him.
Młynar Nearl.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Even though I think that he'll remain a useless piece of trash till the end, we must ensure that he does not affect our future plans.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: As for you, Miss, you must personally ensure that this carries on smoothly——
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Ouch——! P-please be more gentle...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Bear with it! This ointment is really expensive!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: It's my fault for not teaching you this. Being able to properly manage your injuries during a competition is also important. Lift up your hair.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Actually, I didn't expect that it would——Ah, ouch!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Going up against Ingra and then Topola, you should count your lucky stars that all four limbs are intact and you haven't suffered any major injuries...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Alright, put your clothes on.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Don't move for a few days and just stay still. Ending up with a stubborn old wound is one of the worst dangers of being a knight. Don't be like me.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Thank you, Auntie... err Zofia.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maria, that combat style... How did you come up with it?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Rather than a combat style... Err, I was forced into it, actually...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: At the time, my only thoughts were 'Just hold on. There must be something I can do'——
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Ouch!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Don't put yourself through hell for such a stupid reason! The accumulated fatigue will just make your next battles harder!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Sorry!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Luckily you were able to take advantage of the carelessness of that 'Left-hand.' If that sadistic pervert didn't underestimate you... then you'd be in trouble.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Eh, have you fought him before?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: His first match after officially joining the Blade Helmet Knightclub was against me.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: O-Oh...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...What happened?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: That's why he refuses to talk to anyone about his debut battle.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: It's all in the past, though... There is always a winner and loser in knight sports... He doesn't care about me.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...Mr. Tytus seemed to recognize Margaret.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Yep. The three members of Blade Helmet Knightclub, including him, tried to encircle Margaret during the melee, but ended up getting annihilated instead. Who would accept such an outrageous thing?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I-Is Margaret so merciless?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Margaret was very young back then.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...What was she thinking?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I remember that she hated knight sports more than anything, right? There was a time when I even thought that she was just like Uncle Młynar...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: But in the end, she still went and became a competition knight, and even became the Radiant Knight...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...I don't know what she was thinking either. But she should be more aware than most what the knight sports represent.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Even so, she still went, and climbed to the peak.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: At the very least, there were quite a few people who fervently admired Margaret and were inspired by her to become knights, including me.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Ehehe...To be honest, that was part of the reason for me too...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Who knows, maybe the reason she became the champion was to get a few more Zofias and Marias.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Is that it?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I don't know either.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I wonder if she's living well, at that Rhodes Island place...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Ahh—!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Wh-What? Don't surprise me like that...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Th-There's a notch on my blade...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Ugh... You haven't been able to properly maintain your weapons, so it's not surprising that it ended up like this.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Can you deal with it yourself?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: *Sigh* Maybe, if I could borrow Master Kowal's workshop...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: What's up, V? Focus on driving. Don't make me get out and call a taxi.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: I'm just thinking about those two squirrels... If you get out now I swear I'll run you over.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: ...Those Infected, huh.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: That day we almost got into a fight. Those people outside... could they have been?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Most likely.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Have they set their sights on Maria as well? Why?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: ...You're overthinking it.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Is it gonna rain the day after tomorrow?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Cloudy.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman
